languages.text: "Это требование нарушить не протокол взаимодействия с кибермастифом, но принципы Адептус Арбитес. Согласно им Глейто — оружие, а арбитры не используют вооружение для увеселения знатных особ".

"You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."
languages.original_text: "Это требование нарушить не протокол взаимодействия с кибермастифом, но принципы Адептус Арбитес. Согласно им Глейто — оружие, а арбитры не используют вооружение для увеселения знатных особ".

traits.locale_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but rather the principles of the Adeptus Arbites. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

"You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

languages.text: 「あなたが私に破らせようとしているのは、サイバーマスチフの運用プロトコルではなく、高等裁定局の原則そのものです。その原則とは、グライトは武器であり、アービトレイターは貴族の気晴らしのためには決して武器を使わない、というものです」
languages.original_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが私に破らせようとしているのは、サイバーマスチフの運用プロトコルではなく、高等裁定局の原則そのものです。その原則とは、グライトは武器であり、アービトレイターは貴族の気晴らしのためには決して武器を使わない、というものです」

languages.text: "Ihr verlangt, dass ich nicht nur das Protokoll zum Umgang mit Cyber-Mastiffs verletze, sondern die Prinzipen des Adeptus Arbites selbst. Laut diesen Prinzipien ist Glaito eine Waffe, und Arbitratoren benutzen ihre Waffen niemals zur Unterhaltung von Adligen."
languages.original_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr verlangt, dass ich nicht nur das Protokoll zum Umgang mit Cyber-Mastiffs verletze, sondern die Prinzipen des Adeptus Arbites selbst. Laut diesen Prinzipien ist Glaito eine Waffe, und Arbitratoren benutzen ihre Waffen niemals zur Unterhaltung von Adligen."

languages.text: « Vous ne vous contentez pas d'exiger que j'enfreigne le protocole relatif aux cyber-mastiffs, vous me demandez d'outrepasser les principes mêmes de l'Adeptus Arbites. Ces principes indiquent que Glaito est une arme et les arbitrators ont interdiction d'employer leurs armes pour distraire les membres de la noblesse. »
languages.original_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne vous contentez pas d'exiger que j'enfreigne le protocole relatif aux cyber-mastiffs, vous me demandez d'outrepasser les principes mêmes de l'Adeptus Arbites. Ces principes indiquent que Glaito est une arme et les arbitrators ont interdiction d'employer leurs armes pour distraire les membres de la noblesse. »

languages.text: «Me exige que viole no ya el protocolo del manejo de cibermastines, sino los principios mismos del Adeptus Arbites. Dichos principios estipulan que Glaito es un arma, y un Arbitrator jamás utilizaría sus armas para el entretenimiento de los ilustres».
languages.original_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

traits.locale_text: «Me exige que viole no ya el protocolo del manejo de cibermastines, sino los principios mismos del Adeptus Arbites. Dichos principios estipulan que Glaito es un arma, y un Arbitrator jamás utilizaría sus armas para el entretenimiento de los ilustres».

languages.text: “你要求我违反的并不是生化獒犬的协议，而是帝国法务部本身的原则。根据法务部的原则，格雷托是武器，而法务官永远不该出于取悦贵族的目的使用这件武器。”
languages.original_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

traits.locale_text: “你要求我违反的并不是生化獒犬的协议，而是帝国法务部本身的原则。根据法务部的原则，格雷托是武器，而法务官永远不该出于取悦贵族的目的使用这件武器。”

languages.text: "Yalnızca siber mastif idare protokolünü değil, bizzat Adeptus Arbites'in ilkelerini ihlal etmemi talep ediyorsunuz. Bu ilkeler, Glaito'nun bir silah olduğunu ve Yargıcıların silahlarını asla soylu kişilerin eğlencesine alet edilmemesi gerektiğini belirtir."
languages.original_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca siber mastif idare protokolünü değil, bizzat Adeptus Arbites'in ilkelerini ihlal etmemi talep ediyorsunuz. Bu ilkeler, Glaito'nun bir silah olduğunu ve Yargıcıların silahlarını asla soylu kişilerin eğlencesine alet edilmemesi gerektiğini belirtir."

languages.original_text: "You demand that I violate not the protocol of cyber-mastiff handling, but the principles of the Adeptus Arbites themselves. Those principles state that Glaito is a weapon, and Arbitrators never use their weapons for the amusement of noble persons."
